title: Team looking for players, Gold-Plat
body:
Gold-Plat players, I'm making a team, we're going to be on daily. I want to practice as frequently as possible and I would like to do tourneys by mid June. I will be looking for players in the eastern time zone, or central. I've been looking for a team for awhile and after awhile of waiting i just decided that i should make one.


Top- ?
Jungle- ?
Mid-?
ADC- Karuka.
Support- ?


Role: 
Rank:
Champion Pool:
Why you want to be on a team:
Strength:
Weakness:
Time zone:
Age:

replies.body:
Role: mid/top
Rank: d4
Champion Pool: jayce yasuo riven  ahri
Why you want to be on a team:need to focus on teamwork not solo skill
Strength: solo skill
Weakness: my solo skill 
Time zone: est
Age: 21

Role: Support
Rank: Gold 5
Champion Pool: Janna, Thresh, Morgana, Bard, Karma
Why you want to be on a team: If its a dedicated team, why not?
Strength: Call outs, Map awareness
Weakness: ?
Time zone: EST
Age: 24

CLG Worst Janna is my account btw I don't know why this hasn't updated.
